about_the_game:
A Spectacular US Airborne Operations DLC for Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Ostfront.

This DLC brings you a superbly detailed storyline, following the US airborne operations in western Europe in an exciting and immersive new format.

It features some of the most iconic battles fought by US paratroopers from the 82nd and 101st airborne divisions in World War 2.

Action

Re-live the adrenaline-packed battles that helped decide the outcome of the war. Step into the boots of the 82nd and 101st airborne divisions and fight your way through France, Belgium, the Netherlands, and Germany.

Jump into action over St. Mère-Église, fight for Brécourt Manor, take part in Operation Market Garden. Defend Bastogne during the harsh winter of 1944-45 and push on into Germany to the crossing of the Elbe river.

Every historical scene adds to an unforgettable journey, paying tribute to some of the bravest men to see action in the entirety of WWII, men whose names have been added to the roster of characters in the missions.

New Single Player format

In this DLC you will experience a new feel to single-player missions.

Crafted with the feedback of the community in mind, we have created deep, immersive, and complex missions that have a huge appeal to lovers of cinematic and action-packed single-player.

You can expect novel or upgraded features such as complex secret objectives, and more.

Content of this DLC

The Airborne DLC contains the following new content:

  • 12 single-player missions for the US 101st and 82nd Airborne divisions (these missions can be played in Co-Op as well)

  • Over 100 new environment models for the key locations featured in the missions, including an assortment of map assets for the Netherlands

  • 9 new vehicles:

  • C-47 Skytrain
  • 2cm Flakvierling 38
  • 10.5cm LeFH 18/40
  • Sd.Kfz 7/1 (2cm Flakvierling)
  • Goatley Boat
  • Bedford OYD
  • Universal Carrier Mk.II
  • Sherman III (Late)
  • Sherman VC


We would like to dedicate this DLC to our friend Trevor Hackbardt. Trevor's enthusiasm, humor and kindness left an indelible mark on our team. We will continue to celebrate his legacy in the game he helped create.

content_descriptors.notes: Historical WWII depiction. Players will be exposed to mature and sensitive content. No body mutilation, or excessive use of gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64bit - Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD drive and fast internet connection needed for optimal gameplay
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit - Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 / RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD drive and fast internet connection needed for optimal gameplay

short_description: Re-live the legendary operations of the 82nd and 101st US airborne divisions. This DLC offers a new immersive single-player format which takes you from the first para drops in Normandy through Market Garden, the battle of the Bulge and the crossing of the Elbe River.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
